column5: Anybody know anything about Theriau Lake in Northern Saskatchewan? Fly In or Drive In - Hows the fishing. Web Site? Any info would be appreciated.

http://72.14.203.104/search?q=cache:...a&ct=clnk&cd=1http://72.14.203.104/search?q=cache:...a&ct=clnk&cd=6 Here are a couple links.It is strickly fly-in. Hunting also available. Don Lamont ( The Complete Angler ) did a show from there. Hammered big Pike.
